account.requestCode.error: Failed to send SMS with code.
account.create.error: Username is taken. Try something else.
account.setupSeedPhrase.success: Seed phrase recovery setup is complete.
account.setupSeedPhrase.error: An error occurred while setting up seed phrase recovery. Please try again!
account.login.success: ${title} is now authorized to use your account.
account.login.error: An error occurred while approving this action. Please try again!
account.login.details.warning: This allows access to your entire balance. Please proceed with caution.

setupSeedPhrase.pageText: Write down the following words IN ORDER and keep them somewhere safe. You cannot recover your account without them!

setupSeedPhraseVerify.pageText: Enter the following word from your recovery phrase to complete the setup process.

setupSeedPhraseSuccess.pageText: Use your Recovery Phrase to restore your account.
setupSeedPhraseSuccess.pageTextSecondLine: Anyone with access to your Recovery Phrase can access your funds, so keep it offline somewhere safe and secure.

selectAccountDropdown.switchAccounthNotAllowed: This app doesn't allow account changes

recoverWithLink.title: Restore Account
recoverWithLink.pTwo: If this isn't your preferred browser, copy the URL and complete this process in your browser of choice.
recoverWithLink.errorP: If you've enabled email recovery, please check your inbox for the latest message, as all earlier messages are considered invalid.

fullAccessKeys.submitAnyTransaction: Submit any transaction on your behalf
fullAccessKeys.noKeys:
You have not connected your NEAR Wallet to any applications. When you do, you can manage them here.

See what's been built with NEAR:

recoverAccount.pageText: If you’ve setup one or more account recovery methods, follow the instructions below to begin the recovery process.

email.title: Email
email.desc: Check your email for a message from nearprotocol.com with the subject:
email.subject: "Important: Near Wallet Recovery Email".

phone.title: Phone
phone.desc: Check your phone records for an SMS message from

phrase.title: Seed Phrase
phrase.desc: Make sure you have your 12 word recovery phrase, then click below to begin the recovery process.

recoverAccount.actionRequired: This message contains a magic link. Click the link to begin recovery!

createAccount.pageText: Just choose a username and you’re all set.

note.title: NOTE
note.one: Your username can contain any of the following:
note.four: Characters (_-) can be used as separators

recoverSeedPhrase.pageText: Enter the backup seed phrase associated with the account.

pageText.email: Enter your email to make your account easily recoverable in the future.
pageText.phoneNumber: Enter your phone number to make your account easily recoverable in the future.

switchToManualBackup.title: Switch to Manual Backup
switchToManualBackup.text: With this option, you must write down and save a 12 word phrase to recover your account.

one.email: You should have received an email with a magic link. If you ever lose access to your account, simply click the link, and your account will be restored.
one.phoneNumber: You should have received an SMS with a magic link. If you ever lose access to your account, simply click the link, and your account will be restored.

two.email: Please confirm receipt of this email at:
two.phoneNumber: Please confirm receipt of this SMS at:

one.email: If you did not yet receive this email, or the above email address is incorrect,
one.phoneNumber: If you did not yet receive this SMS, or the above phone number is incorrect,

two.email: to Re-enter your email address and resend.
two.phoneNumber: to Re-enter your phone number and resend.

disclaimer.title: DISCLAIMER
disclaimer.text: This is a developers' preview Wallet. It should be used for NEAR Protocol DevNet only. Learn more at

footer.desc: NEAR is a scalable computing and storage platform that changes how the web works for better.
